subject: The Cave
text:
In the cave
 Of all my feelings
 Where this deepest thoughts can dwell
 Are the beginnings of my healings
 And the depths of living hell

 Whatever path I choose
 Will come from that deep source
 And whether I win or lose
 I have solely chosen the course

 Who knows what's in that brew
 That mix of happy and sad
 I haven't the slightest clue
 And it could be good or bad

 There comes a time for action
 A time to move and do
 Whatever the satisfaction
 It comes from the primal brew
